attributes.action: that from this year, the 16th of july will hear by be National Spam Day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we as whole are all in agreement that the tinned meat SPAM has been forgotten and tossed aside by the nation like a used nappy, by creating National SPAM Day, we will bring back the meat that this country has favoured for decades upon decades, we want to ensure that our children, and our childrens children dont have to suffer the mis-fortune of missing out on this glorious meat!!

Save Our Spam

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
